title: Natural Bridges National Monument: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go        Map of Natural Bridges    Â    1. Sipapu Bridge 2. Horsecollar Ruin 3. Kachina Bridge 4. Owachomo Bridge 5. Solar Power System The main features of Natural Bridges are shown on the above map. Most visitors spend at least two to three hours exploring the area. Plan on stopping at the visitor center and touring the scenic drive, with stops at each overlook to view the bridges. Several short hikes allow closer inspection of these remarkable formations, as well as Horsecollar Ruin.
